content: 4 / 10 cm long thread yarn through live stitches and pull to close weave in ends and block in warm water with a little wool wash abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 together mc main colour c x contrast colour 1/2/3/4 repeat repeat ssk slip-slip-knit st stitch #daybreakhat page 2 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2023 - for personal use only
